command.text: select "Facility"."FacilityID" "FacilityID" ,"Facility"."FacilityName" "FacilityName" ,"Facility"."BusinessUnit" "BusinessUnit" ,"Facility"."CreationDate" "CreationDate" ,"Facility"."ActivationDate" "ActivationDate" ,"Facility"."InactiveDate" "InactiveDate" ,"Facility"."DBAName" "Dbaname" ,"Facility"."Contact" "Contact" ,"Address"."Address1" "Address1" ,"Facility"."AddressID" "AddressID" ,"Org"."OrgName1" "OrgName1" ,"Org"."EIN" "OrgEin" ,"Facility"."OrgID" "OrgID" from "core"."Facility" "Facility" left join "core"."Address" "Address" on "Facility"."AddressID" = "Address"."AddressID" left join "core"."Organization" "Org" on "Facility"."OrgID" = "Org"."OrgID"

select "People"."PersonId" "PersonID" ,"People"."FirstName" "FirstName" ,"People"."MiddleName" "MiddleName" ,"People"."LastName" "LastName" ,"People"."LastName2" "LastName2" ,"People"."AliasName" "AliasName" ,"People"."PositionID" "PositionID" ,"Position"."PositionName" "PositionName" ,"People"."ManagerID" "ManagerID" ,"Manager"."FirstName" "ManagerFirstName" ,"People"."Salary" "Salary" ,"People"."SalaryPeriod" "SalaryPeriod" ,"SalaryPeriod"."Period" "SalaryPeriod1" ,"People"."EmergencyContactPersonName" "EmergencyContactPersonName" ,"People"."EmergencyContactPersonRelation" "EmergencyContactPersonRelation" ,"People"."EmergencyContactPersonPhone" "EmergencyContactPersonPhone" ,"People"."CommunicationID" "CommunicationID" ,"Communication"."Phone" "CommunicationPhone" ,"People"."FacilityID" "FacilityID" ,"Facility"."FacilityName" "FacilityName" ,"People"."AddressID" "AddressID" ,"Address"."Address1" "Address1" ,"People"."PersonTypeId" "PersonTypeID" ,"PersonType"."TypeName" "PersonTypeName" ,"People"."DepartmentId" "DepartmentID" ,"Department"."DeptName" "DepartmentDeptName" ,"Organization"."OrgName1" "OrganizationOrgName1" ,"Organization"."EIN" "OrganizationEin" from "core"."People" "People" left join "core"."OrgPositions" "Position" on "People"."PositionID" = "Position"."PositionID" left join "core"."People" "Manager" on "People"."ManagerID" = "Manager"."PersonId" left join "core"."SalaryPeriod" "SalaryPeriod" on "People"."SalaryPeriod" = "SalaryPeriod"."Id" left join "core"."Communication" "Communication" on "People"."CommunicationID" = "Communication"."CommunicationID" left join "core"."Facility" "Facility" on "People"."FacilityID" = "Facility"."FacilityID" left join "core"."Organization" "Organization" on "Facility"."OrgID" = "Organization"."OrgID" left join "core"."Address" "Address" on "People"."AddressID" = "Address"."AddressID" left join "core"."PersonType" "PersonType" on "People"."PersonTypeId" = "PersonType"."TypeId" left join "core"."Department" "Department" on "People"."DepartmentId" = "Department"."DeptId"
